modShortDescription: This includes wood, brick, and concrete arch windows, and all of the variants of the store windows including open, normal glass, and bulletproof glass.
modDescription:
This mod will let you craft all of the other windows that are in the game that you currently canâ€™t craft. Iceburg71 got tired of setting up in a place and not being able to make it look nice. So survive in style and enjoy.

This includes wood, brick, and concrete arch windows, and all of the variants of the store windows including open, normal glass, and bulletproof glass.

Server side friendly, so just drop in and go.

**[Download](https://docs.google.com/uc?export=download&id=1aatbt3ePnd7C6nBadLdwnQQ9wlxnl0Fk)**

The forum topic of the mod is [here](https://community.7daystodie.com/topic/22348-craft-windows/).

**Credits:** [Iceburg71](https://7daystodiemods.com/tag/iceburg71/)
